name: Kindred Coffee Roasters
address:
148 W Washington St, Ste 200
West Chicago, Illinois 60185

roasts.name: Papua New Guinea Sigri Estate
roasts.tasting_notes: understated classic PNG funk, more citrus than berries, more baking spice than chocolate.  good stuff. i like this roaster. competent but not flashy. unusual origins made approachble. accessible drinkability. what PNG coffees are all about, without being off-putting.

roasts.name: Uganda Rwenzori Natural
roasts.tasting_notes: light touch of delicious fermenty sweetness, solid body, nice chocolate character, subtle smooth caramel. wonderful balance. not overbearing, not boring. a little of everything including the modern fascination with natural processing, without going overboard. extremely drinkable.
